membership:
Member of the American Chamber of Commerce to the EU. 
Member of ACEM, the Association for the Motorcycle Industry in Europe. 
Our subsidiary offices are members of National motorcycle industry associations, e.g. Inter alia, the MCIA (UK), IVM (Germany), RAI (Netherlands), CSIAM (France), ANCMA (Italy).
goals__remit: Harley-Davidson Europe Ltd. is the regional head office for sales, marketing, distribution and other associated activities of the Harley-Davidson Motor Company, within Europe, the Middle East and Africa (EMEA).  With the regional head office based in the UK, the company has a further 12 subsidiary offices located across the EMEA territory, selling products into 52 countries within the region. Sales of heavyweight motorcycles, parts, accessories and general merchandising are made “business-to-business”, to an independent dealer network.
